results.name: Triangle read by rows: The Bell transform of the quartic factorial numbers (A007696).
link: Richell O. Celeste, Roberto B. Corcino, Ken Joffaniel M. Gonzales. Two Approaches to Normal Order Coefficients. Journal of Integer Sequences, Vol. 20 (2017), Article 17.3.5.
mathematica: (* The function BellMatrix is defined in A264428. *)
Table[M[[n, k]], {n, 1, rows}, {k, 1, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jul 23 2019 *)
program: multifact_4_1 = lambda n: prod(4*k + 1 for k in (0..n-1))
xref: Bell transforms of other multifactorials are: A000369, A004747, A039683, A051141, A051142, A119274, A132062, A132393, A203412.
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Dec 30 2015
